context: Hello I love action movies Do you know any good ones?
Me too! I am a big fan of Die Hard (1988)
WOW that is also one of my most favorite action movies
My favorite is probably Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991)
That is also a solid choice! The best of the terminator films
Do you watch any international action films?
Yes Korean action movies are my favorite Such as Oldboy (2003) and I Saw the Devil (2010)
have you seen The Man from Nowhere (2010) I love both of those!!
No that is the one action movie from Korea that I have not seen surprisingly I just could not find a good quality version of that movie
It used to be on netflix
Dang I would have checked it out for sure. I have heard great things about that Have you seen The Chaser (2008) Another solid korean action movie
resp: Train to Busan (2016) is also excellent No I'll look into that for sure

context.content: Hello
Hi! What kind of movies do you like?
I'm into exciting and daring adventure movies, humorous and entertaining flicks, and heartwarming and wholesome family movies. Do you have any recommendations that cover those genres?
context.feelings: I love unexpected movie recommendations that turn out to be enjoyable. It's always a pleasant surprise to discover new movies that I end up loving.

context.content: Have you seen The Secret Life of Pets (2016)? It's a great family movie.
What's The Secret Life of Pets about?
context.feelings: I didn't expect a family movie recommendation, but I guess it could be heartwarming. I hope the next recommendation will be more exciting and adventurous. The recommender seems to be trying to find something suitable for me, but I hope they understand my preferences better.

context.content: It's about a dog that travels to a new land and finds a mysterious home. It's very cute.
What's the main adventure in The Secret Life of Pets? I'm curious to know more about the exciting and daring parts of the movie.
context.feelings: I like the idea of a dog going on an adventure, but I'm not sure if it's exciting and daring enough for me. The family aspect sounds nice though. The recommender is doing a good job, but I'm still looking for something that covers all my preferred genres.

context.content: The Secret life of Pets is about a puppy that travels across the world to find a new home.
Hmm, The Secret Life of Pets sounds cute, but I'm looking for something with more thrilling adventure and excitement. Do you have any other recommendations?
context.feelings: I'm not sure if The Secret Life of Pets covers the exciting and daring adventure aspect I'm looking for. The adventure seems to be more about finding a new home rather than an action-packed journey. The recommender seems to be focusing more on the cute and heartwarming elements of the movie rather than the thrilling adventure I'm seeking. I appreciate the effort, but I'm still looking for a movie that combines all three genres I mentioned.

context.content: I also recommend The Secret Adventures of Milo and Otis (1986). It's an oldie but a goodie.

context.feelings: I'm glad the recommender is trying to find movies that fit my preferences, but so far the recommendations haven't quite hit the mark. I appreciate the effort, but I'm still looking for that perfect mix of adventure, humor, and heartwarming family moments. I hope the next recommendation will be the one!

The Secret Adventures of Milo and Otis sounds interesting. What's it about?
context.feelings: I wish the recommender could understand my preference for more thrilling adventures and excitement. I appreciate the effort, but I'm still looking for a movie that combines exciting adventure, humor, and heartwarming family elements. I hope the next recommendation will be a perfect fit for me.

context.content: It's about a cat that is a secret agent and a dog that goes after them. It follows them through their adventures.
